full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` , ,KHRO BO RGYAL PO SME BA BRTZEGS PA'I LAS TSOGS SGRUB THABS RJE GNANG BYED TSUL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @210A *, ,(KHRO BO'I RGYAL PO SME BA BRTZEGS PA'I SGRUB THABS LAS TSOGS RJES GNANG BYA TSUL DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, RTZA BA'I BLA MA TSUL KHRIMS RNAM RGYAL GYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS STOBS 'BAR 'OD ZER GYIS ZIN BRIS SU BTAB PA'O, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO BA KUN, ,RGYAL BA KUN GYI 'PHRIN LAS MA LUS PA, ,GTUM CHEN KHRO BO'I GZUGS KYIS MDZES GYUR BA'I, ,SME BRTZEGS GO 'PHANG TSE 'DIR MYUR THOB SHOG ,GNAS SKABS SU YANG LAM MCHOG RTEN 'DI LA, ,MI MTHUN PHYOGS KYI 'TSE BA MED PA DANG, ,LEGS TSOGS MTHA' DAG 'DREN PA BZHIN 'DUS NAS, ,PHUN TSOGS DPAL LA RTAG TU ROL BAR SHOG ,)
